else: result.add item


\end{description}
dealloc extused


\end{description}
\begin{description}\item[proc walk\_glob*(globpattern: string): seq\symbol{91}string\symbol{93} \symbol{123}.exportpy.\symbol{125} =] \rsthB{Faster os.walk() using 1 standard POSIX like Glob Pattern string, return 1 list of strings.}\label{faster-osdotwalk-using-1-standard-posix-like-glob-pattern-string-return-1-list-of-stringsdot}

\begin{description}\item[proc walk\_simple*(folderpath: string, recursive: bool = true, relative: bool = false, check\_folders: bool = false): seq\symbol{91}string\symbol{93} \symbol{123}.exportpy.\symbol{125} =] \rsthB{Faster os.walk(), it only takes the path, return 1 list of strings.}\label{faster-osdotwalk-it-only-takes-the-path-return-1-list-of-stringsdot}
\begin{description}\item[if likely(recursive):] for item in walkDirRec(folderpath, relative=relative, checkDir=check\_folders): result.add item
\item[else:] for item in walkDir(folderpath, relative, checkDir=check\_folders): result.add item.path
\end{description}

\end{description}
\begin{description}\item[proc walk\_files*(globpattern: string, folders\_only: bool = false): seq\symbol{91}string\symbol{93} \symbol{123}.exportpy.\symbol{125} =] \rsthB{Faster os.walk(), similar to walks but optimized for Files or Folders only.}\label{faster-osdotwalk-similar-to-walks-but-optimized-for-files-or-folders-onlydot}
\begin{description}\item[if unlikely(folders\_only):] for item in walkDirs(globpattern): result.add item
\item[else:] for item in walkFiles(globpattern): result.add item
